data.text: Abụ m okoko osisi ọhịa nke Sharọn,2:1 Okoko osisi a bụ otu nʼime okoko osisi ndị na-epu nʼọkọchị, na ndịda akụkụ osimiri Kamel Aịz 35:1-2
E, dịka okoko lili nke na-epu nʼetiti ogwu,
Onye m hụrụ nʼanya dịka osisi apụl, nʼetiti osisi na-amị mkpụrụ nʼọhịa,
Ka ọ kpọrọ m jee nʼụlọ oriri,
Were mkpụrụ osisi a mịkpọrọ amịkpọ gbaa m ume;
Aka ekpe ya dị nʼokpuru isi m,
Gee ntị! Onye m hụrụ nʼanya!
Onye m hụrụ nʼanya yiri mgbada, o yiri nwa ele.
Onye m hụrụ nʼanya gwara m okwu sị m,

Mkpụrụ osisi fiig ebidola ịmịpụta mkpụrụ ya nke mbụ,2:13 Osisi fiig na-amị mkpụrụ ugboro abụọ nʼafọ nʼIzrel. Ọ bụ nʼoge ọkọchị ka ọ kachasị amị mkpụrụ, amaokwu a na-ekwu banyere owuwe ihe ubi nke mkpụrụ fiig mbụ.
Onye m hụrụ nʼanya bụ nke m, mụ onwe m bụkwa nke ya.
